Description.Name: Pain Shunt... Can't Feel This!
Description.Details:
A knock sounds on your office door and you push a button on your desk to open the door.

Darius strides in and hands you a datapad, "Commander, the initial evaluations for you to undergo surgery for the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LorePainShunt],Pain Shunt procedure]] have come back.  All of your medical history is there and checks out with the surgeons.

You just need to sign that form on the screen and we can proceed from there."

Description.Name: Let's do this!
Description.Details: [Surgical procedure may cost up to Â¢4,000,000]

Description.Name: All Systems Go
Description.Details: You read through the information displayed on the datapad and scribble your signature. Handing the pad to Darius as you stand up, "Ok, let's get this show on the road! Darius stands up, "I will inform the rest of the Command Staff," and heads off to the bridge as you proceed to the MedBay to speak to the Argo's surgeon. You arrive to find the surgeon inspecting the scans of your neural map. "Hello, Commander, do you have any questions before we get you prepped?" You nod, "Yes, yes I do. Do you feel comfortable performing this procedure?" The surgeon nods back, "I do Commander. I have done similar types of surgeries in my past before I hired on with your company. As you know, there are possible..." You interupt the surgeon, "I know all the downsides, no need to go over them again." The surgeon motions to a side door, "Well then, let's get you prepped for the procedure." :::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: You open you eyes to see Darius' grinning visage smiling down at you. You flinch, thinking you are in some nightmare, then realise you are awakening in Post-Op, "You're awake Commander! Good! How do you feel?" beams Darius. "Ugh, I hurt all over, and my head is pounding too." The surgeon moves into your view, "That is to be expected, Commander. Everything seems to have gone fine with your surgery. You should be up and moving in the next couple of days. You can then begin physical and simpod training and by the end of the month should be well enough to go out into the field. It may take up to a year for you to regain 100% of your coordination back though." You smile, "This will be glorious!"

Description.Name: I am not ready at this time.
Abort! Abort!
Description.Details:
You look over information on the datapad, thumbing back and forth through the file numerous times, before letting out a long sigh and closing the datapad.

You hand the pad back to Darius, "Thanks Darius, but I do not think I will take any unnecessary risks at this time.  I do not need to rush into this blindly."

Darius takes the datapad, "As you wish, Commander.  The surgeon also states you must wait 90 days to be reassessed should you change your mind later."
